ISSUE.TITLE: AdminMenu should check for `ListContent` permission instead of `IsListable` before listing menu item
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug Currently, if you want to add a content type to an AdminMenu, the content type would have to be `Listable` in order to be visible. Sometimes, we want to show a content type item on the adminMenu even when it is not listable. The Admin UI does not care if the content type is listable or not. All it checks for is the user has permission to `ListContent`. The logic in the Admin Menu should be the same as the UI.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: AdminMenu to check ListContent permission instead od IsListable. Fix #13724
